languages.text: "Ты воспитал живое орудие, что без сомнений служит цели". {n}Кибелла говорит осторожно, словно не до конца уверенная в своем суждении.{/n}
"You have raised a living instrument that serves a purpose without question." {n}Kibellah speaks cautiously, as if not entirely sure of her judgement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты воспитал живое орудие, что без сомнений служит цели". {n}Кибелла говорит осторожно, словно не до конца уверенная в своем суждении.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You have raised a living instrument that serves a purpose without question." {n}Kibellah speaks cautiously, as if not entirely sure of her judgment.{/n}

"You have raised a living instrument that serves a purpose without question." {n}Kibellah speaks cautiously, as if not entirely sure of her judgement.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr habt ein lebendes Werkzeug großgezogen, das ein Ziel verfolgt, ohne Fragen zu stellen." {n}Kibellah spricht vorsichtig, als wäre sie nicht ganz sicher, was sie davon halten soll.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have raised a living instrument that serves a purpose without question." {n}Kibellah speaks cautiously, as if not entirely sure of her judgement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt ein lebendes Werkzeug großgezogen, das ein Ziel verfolgt, ohne Fragen zu stellen." {n}Kibellah spricht vorsichtig, als wäre sie nicht ganz sicher, was sie davon halten soll.{/n}

languages.text: «Ha criado usted un instrumento vivo que sirve a un propósito sin cuestionarlo». {n}Kibellah habla con cautela, como si no estuviese totalmente segura de su opinión.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have raised a living instrument that serves a purpose without question." {n}Kibellah speaks cautiously, as if not entirely sure of her judgement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ha criado usted un instrumento vivo que sirve a un propósito sin cuestionarlo». {n}Kibellah habla con cautela, como si no estuviese totalmente segura de su opinión.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたは疑いもなく目的を果たす生きた道具を育てたのよ」{n}キベラは決め切らないという様子で、慎重に話す。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have raised a living instrument that serves a purpose without question." {n}Kibellah speaks cautiously, as if not entirely sure of her judgement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは疑いもなく目的を果たす生きた道具を育てたのよ」{n}キベラは決め切らないという様子で、慎重に話す。{/n}

languages.text: “你培养出了一件有血有肉的工具，会毫不犹豫地朝目标前进。”{n}绮贝菈的语气小心翼翼，似乎对自己的判断并不是非常有把握。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have raised a living instrument that serves a purpose without question." {n}Kibellah speaks cautiously, as if not entirely sure of her judgement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你培养出了一件有血有肉的工具，会毫不犹豫地朝目标前进。”{n}绮贝菈的语气小心翼翼，似乎对自己的判断并不是非常有把握。{/n}

languages.text: « Vous avez fait de lui un pion, un instrument qui sert aveuglément un objectif sans poser de questions. » {n}Kibellah s'exprime avec prudence, comme si elle n'était pas tout à fait sûre de son jugement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have raised a living instrument that serves a purpose without question." {n}Kibellah speaks cautiously, as if not entirely sure of her judgement.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez fait de lui un pion, un instrument qui sert aveuglément un objectif sans poser de questions. » {n}Kibellah s'exprime avec prudence, comme si elle n'était pas tout à fait sûre de son jugement.{/n}

languages.text: "Tek bir amaca sorgulamadan hizmet eden, yaşayan bir gereç yetiştirmişsin." {n}Kibellah temkinli bir şekilde, muhakemesine tam olarak güvenmiyormuş gibi konuşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have raised a living instrument that serves a purpose without question." {n}Kibellah speaks cautiously, as if not entirely sure of her judgement.{/n}
